abstract_ssm: The Central Brooklyn Coordinating Council (CBCC) publications span the years 1965 to 1972 and are housed in one half manuscript box. Represented in the collection are newsletters and one annual report issued by the CBCC. The annual report dates from the 8th Annual General Meeting, held in 1966. The run of the newsletter includes the inaugural issue (August, 16, 1965) through October 1967. The run of the newsletter , begins with the inaugural issue published on March 9, 1968 and goes through May 1972.
